question: If someone passes away during the Holy month of Ramadan, does he enter Janaat without reckoning?
answer:
QUESTION
I was told that if someone dies during this month, Allah permits him entrance into Janaat without any questioning of his deeds. Is this true?
ANSWER


Share:
It is hoped that Allah Ta'ala through His infinite Mercy grants him entrance
into Jannat without any questioning. (Fataawa Mahmoodiyya vol.11 pg.90)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
